Package com.tloj.game.entities.characters

Class MechaKnight

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.entities.Entity
com.tloj.game.entities.CombatEntity
com.tloj.game.entities.Character
com.tloj.game.entities.characters.MechaKnight
All Implemented Interfaces:
ItemsHolderEntity, MovingEntity
public class MechaKnight extends Character
Class to represent the MechaKnight class in the game
It has the following fixed initial attributes:
30 health points
5 mana points
1 attack points
5 defense points
5 maximum weight capacity
15 money
It has the Guard ability
See Also:
